English.Text: Can it be the voice of a child this deep in the jungle? The expedition has taken a couple of days sojourn inland, looking for citrus to save them from scurvy. Taking shelter during a particularly heavy cloudburst, they are sure they can hear children's voices through the pitter-patter of rain. Your men strain to see where it may be coming from. "It is Lucifer, of cloven hoof, leading us astray!" whispers the priest, "pay him no heed!"
